definition: to concede/to admit defeat/to admit sth is wrong after insisting it is right

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
lit. if you agree to bet you must accept to lose/fig. you bet, you pay

sentences.english: You always scolded by their parents but never cry out in defeat.
sentences.chinese: 你總容易被父母罵哭卻從未在外面服輸。

sentences.english: Fu strong woman will admit defeat, but will not admit defeat.
sentences.chinese: 乀堅強的女人會認輸，但不會服輸。

sentences.english: So he always optimistically, life, failed not discouraged, don't lose.
sentences.chinese: 所以他總是樂觀地面對生活，失敗了不氣餒，不服輸。

sentences.english: A true soldier does not admit defeat before the battle.
sentences.chinese: 真正的戰士是不會在戰前服輸的。

sentences.english: Because they all have admitted defeat and challenge themselves psychological.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他們都有不服輸，挑戰自我的心理。

sentences.english: But, I am not going to give up.
But an emulative idea lets Liu manager decide to insist to come down.
sentences.chinese: 但一股不服輸的意念讓劉經理決定堅持下來。

sentences.english: I refused to say uncle no matter how they threatened me.
sentences.chinese: 無論他們怎樣嚇唬我，我都不肯服輸。

sentences.english: She seek to prevail over others, unyielding spirit lets me admire.
sentences.chinese: 她爭強好勝，不服輸的精神讓我佩服。

sentences.english: Can let black burning concede vanquish, Zhang Fei's real strenght naturally as anticipated assorted general.
sentences.chinese: 能夠讓黑炎服輸，張斐的實力果然不同一般。

sentences.english: If you admit defeat, frustration will take the initiative to your head.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不服輸，挫折就會主動向你低頭。
